meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at casual conversation and socializing.
meanings.sent1: At the party, the schmoozers effortlessly chatted with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The schmoozers at the event made sure to talk to every guest.
meanings.sent3: The schmoozers at the office always knew the latest gossip.
meanings.sent4: She was a schmoozer extraordinaire, able to charm anyone with her words.
meanings.sent5: The group of schmoozers were like social butterflies, flitting from one conversation to another.

meanings.definition: To engage in friendly or persuasive conversation, especially to gain favor or advantage.
meanings.sent1: He schmoozers his way into getting the best deals.
meanings.sent2: They schmoozers with the clients to secure the contract.
meanings.sent3: The politician schmoozers with the voters during the campaign.
meanings.sent4: She schmoozers her way through negotiations with finesse.
meanings.sent5: The salesperson schmoozers the customers with a winning smile.
